Package pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gamecharacter

Class InputAction

java.lang.Object
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gamecharacter.InputAction
public final class InputAction extends Object
InputAction is used to bind the keyboard to the Hero. InputAction defines methods that listen for keyboard events ,execute corresponding methods and change image of hero
Author:
YuyanZhou
